INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the risk of hemorrhage due to addition of the platelet antiagregation action
INTERACTION.COMMENT: If the administration of the substances together cannot be avoided, strict clinical monitoring.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the blood concentrations of ciclosporin
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Increase of the dosage of the ciclosporin according to testing of the blood concentrations. Reduction of the dosage if the ticlopidine is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the plasma concentrations of phenytoin with signs of overdose (inhibition of the metabolism of the phenytoin)
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical monitoring and testing of the plasma concentrations of phenytoin.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the theophyllinemia with risk of overdose (decrease of the plasma clearance of the theophylline).
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Clinical monitoring and possibly monitoring of the theophyllinemia; if there is reason for it, adjustment of the dosage of the theophylline during the treatment with the ticlopidine and after it is stopped.
